entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is the one who has come to discuss a serious breach of wizarding law. He mentions that he sent an owl but Gaunt doesn't open letters.

entities.name: gaunt
entities.description: Gaunt is the owner of the house where Morfin lives. He is being visited by Ogden about a serious breach of wizarding law.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is the one who has committed a serious breach of wizarding law. He is sitting in an armchair beside a smoking fire, twisting a live adder between his fingers and crooning softly at it in Parseltongue.

entities.name: adder
entities.description: The adder is the animal that Morfin is twisting between his fingers and crooning at in Parseltongue.

relationships.description: Ogden has come to visit Gaunt about a serious breach of wizarding law.
Ogden is investigating Morfin for committing a serious breach of wizarding law.
